NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Consumption Venues and column Processing Facilities is the flow between 1971 and 2652? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {2232} from node {Cafes} to {Dairies}, a flow of {2072} from node {Schools} to {Slaughterhouses}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 3076 and 3145? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Wholesalers to node Fisheries and from node Slaughterhouses to node Online Platforms, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Wholesalers} to node {Fisheries} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Cafes to node Slaughterhouses and from node Slaughterhouses to node Online Platforms, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Schools to node Dairies, from node Canneries to node Online Platforms, and from node Slaughterhouses to node Retailers, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Canneries} to node {Online Platforms} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Processing Facilities of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Processing Facilities is {Dairies}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Schools to target node Recycling? Please list all node labels along this path.
